alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 9:32PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Callahan, southeastern Jones, Shackelford and Taylor Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 931 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Merkel to near Ovalo. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Albany, Baird, Wylie, Tye, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Lawn, Moran, Putnam, Dudley, Bradshaw, Caps, Dyess Afb, Eula, Potosi, View, Hamby and Impact. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 270 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for west central Texas.
